income_messages:
From: i***********************0@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-03 15:07:55
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir,
  Dear Sir,
My name is Barrister Isay Sagay, I am the director and chief executive officer of The Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit (NFIU). It is the duty of my organization to gather financial intelligence reports with a view to uncovering misappropriations and embezzlement by government officials/agencies. When we discover any, we then make a formal report to higher anti-graft agencies such as EFCC and ICPC to follow up for recovery.
In our recent probe we traced the sum of $13m in cash deposited in a private vault by the late head of state General Sani Abacha there in Europe. I have decided to bring in someone to claim the funds. All that is needed is to change the deposit details. Arrangements to retrieve the cash, exchange it to the Euro currency and deposit it into a proper bank account has been finalized. All that is required is a credible person who will be presented as the owner, which is why I am contacting you.
The late head of state stole so much from the country, read some of the details in the news link:
ABACHA LOOT: How much did the late Head of State steal???????
--------------------------------------------------------------------
It is safe and easy to conclude this with your cooperation immediately.
I am looking forward to your response.
Sincerely
Barrister Isay Sagay
Director Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit (NFIU)
senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN)   
From: i***********************0@gmail.com
To: ki18797@m**************m
Time: 2023-04-03 15:31:13
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Sir,
Dear Mrs Susan
Thanks for your prompt reply to my proposal. Content of your mail is highly
noted. In line with the payment procedure of the fund payment deposited in
a vault in Europe
As chief executive officer of The Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit
(NFIU) , I have concluded every necessary arrangement to move the fund in
your name as the Beneficiary and all the legal clearance documents will be
obtained in your name without any problem.
What is need is to change the deposits details to your name and address for
claims
All that is required is a credible person who will be presented as the
owner, That is why I am contacting you.100% risk free without any problem
from Financial Authorities concerned globally.
With all due respect Sir. Kindly confirm the following
1) Your full name /Address.
2) Direct Mobile phone/WhatSapp line.
3) A copy of your Identification.
Sincerely
Barrister Isay Sagay
Director Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit (NFIU)
senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN)

conversations.subject: SUBJECT:   Dear Sir,
conversations.body:
Dear Sir,
My name is Barrister Isay Sagay, I am the director and chief executive officer of The Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit (NFIU). It is the duty of my organization to gather financial intelligence reports with a view to uncovering misappropriations and embezzlement by government officials/agencies. When we discover any, we then make a formal report to higher anti-graft agencies such as EFCC and ICPC to follow up for recovery.
In our recent probe we traced the sum of $13m in cash deposited in a private vault by the late head of state General Sani Abacha there in Europe. I have decided to bring in someone to claim the funds. All that is needed is to change the deposit details. Arrangements to retrieve the cash, exchange it to the Euro currency and deposit it into a proper bank account has been finalized. All that is required is a credible person who will be presented as the owner, which is why I am contacting you.
The late head of state stole so much from the country, read some of the details in the news link:
ABACHA LOOT: How much did the late Head of State steal???????
--------------------------------------------------------------------
It is safe and easy to conclude this with your cooperation immediately.
I am looking forward to your response.
Sincerely
Barrister Isay Sagay
Director Nigerian Financial Intelligence Unit (NFIU)
senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN)
